stories.text:
Hello HN,

I built Teamates.io[0] - a place for professionals to have small coffee chats with a random partner right now. Think of it like a virtual coffeeshop where you can chat with strangers while you're taking a little break. It's in open beta and you can try using it right now. Please be nice and professional to each other :)

I noticed over the course of pandemic I missed casual elevator and coffee chats with my coworkers, as well as random chats with strangers. I think it's important to have these unplanned conversations to feel more connected with other people and learn random stories/ideas.

I would really appreciate the feedback from you all, since I believe it's a pretty important problem to solve. Feel free to leave a HN comment or fill out a survey at the end of your call. I took a day off to reply to your questions and feedback, as well as talk to you directly on the platform :)

Thanks, Aibek

[0] https://www.teamates.io
stories.title: Show HN: Teamates.io – Random video chats for professionals
